abstract: European Union regulators say a plan by the world’s No. 2 and No. 3 iron ore miners, Rio Tinto and BHP Billiton, to combine some operations could damage competition.
snippet: European Union regulators say a plan by the world’s No. 2 and No. 3 iron ore miners, Rio Tinto and BHP Billiton, to combine some operations could damage competition.
lead_paragraph: European Union regulators said a plan by the world’s No. 2 and No. 3 iron ore miners, Rio Tinto and BHP Billiton, to combine some operations could damage competition.

headline.main: European Union to Investigate Rio Tinto-BHP Billiton Deal
